title: Lowest Ping servers aussies can xfer to.
body:
Basically im done with Oce iv played over 4k solo que games here and Iv'e wanted to drink bleech after all of themt.  I want to know if theres a preferably asian server (I dont want to have anyclue what anyone is saying) Aussies can xfer to and install a language pack to the client with.  

From what I can see theres a few in the client you can xfer to but they all seem like they have shit ping or might understand english.  Preferably anything with < 100 ping and non english would be optimal.

replies.body:
Maybe drinking bleach would be the easier solution, if you think playing with gooks and 200 ping will solve your problems you are a very delusional child.

Just focus on getting better rather than blaming dumb luck or bad team mates. Silver is VERY easy to climb out of, assuming you have at least 15 brain cells.
Don't blame the server, its your fault and your fault alone that you're stuck there, after 4k games the conclusion is that you are not good at this game.

> Basically im done with Oce iv played over 4k solo que games here and Iv'e wanted to drink bleech after all of themt.

Then changing server isn't really going to help. I know a lot of people say OCE is the worst but most, if not all, servers are pretty bad in themselves. Fact is real people are playing on every server so you're going to get the exact same things happening.
at least 150 ping for sea server or taiwan server so stick with OCE lel
Nowhere otherwise OCE wouldn't have their own server..
it would probably give you like 200-300 ping from here.
